GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 10 DEC THRU 15 JAN 24 BY
   M/V APOLLO, M/V VANGUARD AND M/V THOR FREYJA
   IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 03-10.20N 006-55.46E, 03-10.21N 006-45.74E,
      03-07.78N 006-45.74E, 03-07.77N 006-55.46E.
   B. 03-14.94N 007-15.74E, 03-14.98N 006-17.02E,
      03-05.87N 006-17.01E, 03-05.85N 006-42.96E,
      03-02.88N 006-44.58E, 03-02.85N 007-15.72E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 160001Z JAN 24.
